short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a hyperlink and highlights text which are memes on reddit!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you like to browse Reddit, but have no idea what half the references that people are talking about actually are? To fix this borderline gate keeping, I have created this Chrome Extension which will highlight any term within the 'confirmed' section of KnowYourMeme.com and provide a link to the article!",
